imdb.plot outline: Find out the melodies engraved in the hearts of ethnic cultures for hundreds of years and how even today, young generations relate their feelings and dreams through these very tunes of Rhythm&Roots. The songs that were sung centuries ago and continents away, resonate today in the ears and hearts of Americans at Ebru TV. As we unearth the stories behind the groups and their songs, we also explore characteristic instruments and traditional rhythms of various cultures. Rhythm&Roots connects people with the beauty, joy and celebration of music.
imdb.title: Rhythm & Roots
